mapper.insert: insert into charging_pile(pile_no, type, status, power_rate, price_per_kwh, location_desc, latitude, longitude, create_time, update_time) values (#{pileNo}, #{type}, #{status}, #{powerRate}, #{pricePerKwh}, #{locationDesc}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
select id, pile_no, type, status, power_rate, price_per_kwh, location_desc, latitude, longitude, create_time, update_time from charging_pile
and pile_no like concat('%',#{pileNo},'%')
and status = #{status}
and location_desc like concat('%',#{locationDesc},'%')
order by update_time desc
select id, pile_no, type, status, power_rate, price_per_kwh, location_desc, latitude, longitude, create_time, update_time from charging_pile where id = #{id}
